summary: Makes all Divines Blessings 24 hours instead of 8.
descriptionHtml:
I thought of this mod when I kept having to find a shrine of Mara every time I wanted her blessing. I feel eight hours of blessing just isn\'t enough these days. So, here\'s this mod that makes the blessings last a full 24 hours! Imagine, being able to fast travel to your next mission and not have only an hour of blessing left!! 

Divines Bless Us!
author: pcoppage
